item.title: Slightly out of view traffic, near miss collision, 18th January
item.description:
The traffic light by the Audi garage facing towards Smyths toy store. The traffic light here is dangerous for pedestrians. It turns red for cars coming left from the Tewkesbury Road. However, due to the bend in the road and momentum with which cars drive around it, cars don’t notice the red traffic light at the pedestrian crossing. This morning (18 Jan) at 1025, I waited at the pedestrian light to cross, when it was green for me and red for the cars, 5 cars drove through the light and one did not stop when I walked into the road despite me having right of way. This traffic light is positioned dangerously. Please consider changes or else a fatality will inevitably happen
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
